Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This product holds immense value to me, encapsulating years of innovation and expertise. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, I believe it's worth more than its face value. I am offering you this exceptional product for $12000. I trust this price reflects not only its current market value but also the potential it holds for you. I look forward to your consideration and the opportunity to bring this remarkable product into your possession. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
